entries:
QUIT GAME?
Progress is saved at the start of a new month. Any unsaved progress will be lost.

The summoning ritual must commence at the beginning of a new month, when the moon and stars are correct.
Return when you have

ABANDON PROGRESS AND ABORT RITUAL?
All amassed power will be lost. Any sacrifices made will be for naught.
Commence the summoning with these sacrificial offerings?
The sanctuary is ready for a summoning.
is sacrificed. Your sanity is reduced by
You have no cult members to sacrifice.
You have no prayers to recite. Seek them out in the world where magick and lore is abundant.
Which prayer should be recited during worship?
How would you like to worship?
Your public sermon draws attention from allies and enemies alike.
Behind the closed doors of your sanctuary, whispered prayers soothe your
Alone, you enter the sanctuary and kneel before your master. Your praises earn you brief respite.
How will you search for artefacts?
Those who would seek to stop you have taken notice. Notoriety +
The endeavour failed to uncover any artefacts.
You do not yet have any notoriety, and therefore no enemies.
Among the most sane members of the cult, one steps up to become the new leader.
